q: attention. Heart disease is a serious problem, especially for women, who tend not to get the right care.`` Take advantage of the technology and care that's available,'' David Letterman says. There's no reason why a man or woman in this day and age should unexpectedly drop dead of a heart attack. ` Stop the heart, work on it, restart it- good luck,' Robin Williams tells Barbara Walters during the special.( Svennevik/ABC) Robin Williams tells Barbara Walters he's much more grateful for everything.

With more than 83,000 followers, Jason Pollock is one of the 140 most influential people on Twitter, according to a report in The New York Times. Social media is a powerful tool when used for philanthropy and to highlight innovative products like the new Ford Focus, Jason Pollock said.`` I'm thrilled to be participating in this historic social media event and to be raising money for my father's FREE Partnerships.'' sources said David Cameron gathered a few colleagues together to show his continuing support for Andy Coulson . No 10 is expected to organise a proper leaving party, which will be attended by David Cameron . One source said: It was not a big leaving do. It was a quiet goodbye with the prime minister. There will be a night out with Andy Coulson when colleagues can give him a present. Andy Coulson - who said on 21 January that he had decided to resign because the wave of allegations about illegal phone hacking meant he was unable to do his job- will not receive severance pay,.

. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia was no longer fit for the job. This is simply a recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote at the time. While Steve Ballmer was vague about the reasons, analysts believed that the CEO had lost faith in Muglia's ability to lead the company into the next generation of enterprise computing.

by tea party activists and others- have pledged to reverse this dangerous trend of wasteful federal spending in an effort to place the nation on the path toward fiscal sanity. Veteran Indiana Congressman Mike Pence said: Any increase in the debt ceiling should be married to very real and significant reductions in spending in the short term and the long term.
